# P521.Signing.ECDSASignature

**Structure**

A P-521 elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA) signature.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ECDSASignature
```

## Creating a signature

- **init(derRepresentation:)**: Creates a P-521 digital signature from a Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation.
- **init(rawRepresentation:)**: Creates a P-521 digital signature from a raw representation.

## Representing the signature

- **derRepresentation**: A Distinguished Encoding Rules (DER) encoded representation of a P-521 digital signature.
- **rawRepresentation**: A raw data representation of a P-521 digital signature.

## Creating a signature

- **signature(for:)**: Generates an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) signature of the data you provide over the P-521 elliptic curve, using SHA-512 as the hash function.
- **signature(for:)**: Generates an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) signature of the digest you provide over the P-521 elliptic curve.

## Conforms To

- ContiguousBytes
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
